revision.text:
{{Infobox XC3 Status | title = Defense Up | caption = Reduces damage taken. | image = XC3 Defense Up.png | type = Buff | base-duration = 20.0s | max-duration = 40.0s | rng-applicable = Yes | effect-title-1 = Base Damage Reduction | effect-value-1 = 15% }} '''Defense Up''' is a [[Status Effect]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. It reduces damage taken by the affected character when hit by enemy attacks.
The effect stacks additively with all damage reduction effects, whether granted by Arts, Accessories or Skills. Characters will always take at least 1 damage from any enemy attack that lands (barring further effects such as [[Invincible (XC3)|Invincible]]), even with 100% (or more) damage reduction.
==Distribution== ===Arts=== *[[Butterfly Dust]] ([[Soulhacker]]; requires Soul Hacking [[Perturbed Bilkin]]) *[[Advanced Cooldown]] ([[War Medic]]; field effect) *[[Hyper Reload]] ([[Valdi]]; field effect)
[[Category:XC3 Status]] [[Category:XC3FR Status]]
{{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}}

revision.comment: Created page with "{{Infobox XC3 Status | title = Delayed Healing | caption = Heals HP when below set value. | image = XC3 Delayed Healing.png | type = Buff | base-duration = 20.0s | max-duration = 40.0s | rng-applicable = Yes | effect-title-1 = Base Healing Threshold | effect-value-1 = 30% of character's max HP | effect-title-2 = Base Healing Amount | effect-value-2 = 15% of character's max HP }} '''Delayed Healing''' is a [[Status Effect]] in {{XC3}}. It heals the affected character once..."
revision.text:
{{Infobox XC3 Status | title = Delayed Healing | caption = Heals HP when below set value. | image = XC3 Delayed Healing.png | type = Buff | base-duration = 20.0s | max-duration = 40.0s | rng-applicable = Yes | effect-title-1 = Base Healing Threshold | effect-value-1 = 30% of character's max HP | effect-title-2 = Base Healing Amount | effect-value-2 = 15% of character's max HP }} '''Delayed Healing''' is a [[Status Effect]] in {{XC3}}. It heals the affected character once they fall below a certain HP threshold, after which the buff is removed.
==Notes== *If the character is incapacitated by a hit while above the HP threshold, Delayed Healing will not take effect. *If the character is given the buff while below the HP threshold, Delayed Healing will not take effect until the character is damaged. *The HP threshold for triggering the heal is increased if the buff power is increased, alongside the amount of HP healed from the effect. For example, with a maximum-level [[Swelling Blessing]] [[Gem]], the HP threshold is increased to 45%.
==Distribution== ===Arts=== *[[Vital Bullet]] ([[War Medic]]) [[Category:XC3 Status]]

{{Infobox battle art |name = Deliverance Hew |image = Deliverance Hew.png |who = [[Rex]] |class = |attribute = |target = One Target |distance = |numhits = |power = |aggro = |knockback = |effect = Reduces enemy physical defense by 45 percentage points during Chain Attack. (''FR'')
Reduces enemy physical defense by 45-75 percentage points during Chain Attack. (''XC3'') |duration = |recharge = }} '''Deliverance Hew''' is a [[Battle Arts (XC3)|Chain Art]] in {{XC3FR|sublink}} and {{XC3}}. {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |category = Unique Monster |name = Diabolical Rindolph |image = XC3 Diabolical Rindolph.png |caption = Diabolical Rindolph |type = [[Moramora]] |level = 49 |area = [[Syra Hovering Reefs]] ([[Hovering Reef 7 (XC3)|Hovering Reef 7]]) |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = Flying |detection = |exp = 1,759 |cp = 478 |sp = 5 |gold = 1,436 |hp = 1,359,450 |strength = 722 |healing = 349 |dexterity = 210 |agility = 193 |physdef = 15% |ethdef = 0% |critrate = 12% |guardrate = 0% }} '''Diabolical Rindolph''' is a [[Unique Monster (XC3)|Unique Monster]] in {{XC3}}. It is a member of the [[Moramora]] family, and can be found at level 49 on [[Hovering Reef 7 (XC3)|Hovering Reef 7]] in [[Syra Hovering Reefs]]. The [[Spinning Bolt]] [[Battle Arts (XC3)|Art]] can be earned for the [[Soulhacker]] [[Class (XC3)|class]] by defeating it.
== Resistances == {{XC3 Resistances |break = 35% |physdebuff = 50% |etherdebuff = 80% |knockback = 100% |blowdown = 100%}} {{clr}} == Gallery == <gallery> Diabolical rindolph location.png Diabolical rindolph.png </gallery>
